name: Move Email to Top of WooCommerce Checkout
author: Caitlin Chou

sections.description:
Moves email to the first field of the checkout fields. Encourages customers to enter their email early in the checkout field, which should be used in conjunction with an abandon cart or email capture plugin.

Features
* Lightweight – does not slow down your admin dashboard or frontend
* Mobile-friendly – compatible with mobile devices
sections.installation:
1. Upload move-email-to-top.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload move-email-to-top.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

How do I contact support for help or issues with the plugin?

Post in the support forum or email me at caitlinchou at gmail dot com.

Can I suggest a feature?

I would love to hear your input. Email me at caitlinchou at gmail dot com.
